mapper.select:
select ORDERDETAILS_ID as orderdetailsId,VERSION,NOWDATE,VIRTUALGOODSID,RETURNCODE,
LITRE,STATIONCODE,COUPONAMOUNT,REQUESTID,ORDERNUM,REALAMOUNT,OILCODE,ORDER_DEAL as orderDeal,
DISCOUNTAMOUNT,CARDUSERID,AMOUNT,OILPRICE,TERMNUM,SENDTIME,INVOICETITLE,
MEMBERNO,VIRTUALGOODSIDS,CustomerId from TBL_ORDERDETAILS tod left join TBL_carduser tcu on
tod.carduserid=tcu.id where ORDERDETAILS_ID>#{id}
